data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India. Please, stir the 17,201 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, help the fearful in Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Rajput Paik people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 17,201 believers in the county of Dewas the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dewas, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,563,700.

We estimate Dewas has 17,201 people who might know Jesus, 18,973 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,527,526 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Dewas, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Dewas
location.people_groups_list: Patlia, Bhangi Lal Begi (Muslim traditions), Bhil Mankar, Banchada, Brahmin Malvi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Patlia (32,000), Bhangi Lal Begi (Muslim traditions) (8,700), Bhil Mankar (226,000), Banchada (36,000), Brahmin Malvi (77,000)
